summary.para: Performs an exponential linear unit (ELU) activation function on every element in InputTensor, placing the result into the corresponding element of OutputTensor.
summary.code: f(x) = x, if x >= 0 Alpha * (exp(x) - 1), otherwise
summary.para: Where exp(x) is the natural exponentiation function.
This operator supports in-place execution, meaning that the output tensor is permitted to alias InputTensor during binding.

member.name: DML_ACTIVATION_ELU_OPERATOR_DESC.InputTensor
member.summary: The input tensor to read from.

member.name: DML_ACTIVATION_ELU_OPERATOR_DESC.OutputTensor
member.summary: The output tensor to write the results to.

member.name: DML_ACTIVATION_ELU_OPERATOR_DESC.Alpha
member.summary: The alpha coefficient. A typical default for this value is 1.0.
